rules_text:
Devour 2 [i](As this enters, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.)[/i]
Persist [i](When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control with a -1/-1 counter on it. If a creature has both -1/-1 and +1/+1 counters, remove one of each until only one kind remains.)[/i]
